root.cn: 这是一款平板上儿童教育，幼教启蒙，智力开发，亲子教育，认识水果的早教软件，通过拖动水果图片的形式让宝宝了解常见植物， 在有趣的交互中让宝宝学到的知识记忆更深刻，你想吃的水果都有，应有尽有，千万不要错过呦！涵盖的水果有： 浆果类：草莓，蓝莓，黑莓，桑葚，覆盆子，葡萄，青提，红提，水晶葡萄， 马奶子 柑橘类：砂糖橘，金橘，甜橙，脐橙，西柚，柚子，葡萄柚， 柠檬，文旦 核果类：桃子，李子，樱桃，杏，梅子，杨梅， 西梅，乌梅，红枣，海枣，蜜枣，橄榄，荔枝，龙眼（桂圆），槟榔 仁果类：苹果 ，梨 ，蛇果，海棠果，沙果，柿子，山竹，黑布林， 枇杷，杨桃，山楂，圣女果，无花果，白果，罗汉果，火龙果，猕猴桃 瓜类：西瓜，甜瓜，香瓜，哈密瓜，木瓜，乳瓜 其他：菠萝，芒果，板栗，椰子，奇异果，芭乐，榴莲，香蕉，甘蔗， 莲子，石榴，核桃
root.en: This is a kind of early education software for children's education, early childhood education, intelligence development, parent-child education, and fruit recognition on the Pad. By dragging fruit pictures, babies can learn about common plants, and the knowledge and memory learned by babies can be more profound in interesting interactions. There are all kinds of fruits you want to eat, so don't miss it! Fruits covered include: berries: strawberry, blueberry, blackberry, mulberry, raspberry, grape, qingti, Hongti, crystal grape, milk orange: sugar orange, kumquat, sweet orange, navel orange, grapefruit, grapefruit, grapefruit, lemon, Wendan stone fruit: peach, plum, cherry, apricot, plum, bayberry, Prunus mume, Prunus mume, red jujube, sea jujube, honey jujube, olive, litchi, longan (longan), areca kernel: apple, pear, snake fruit, Begonia fruit, sand fruit, persimmon, mangosteen, black cloth forest, loquat, carambola, hawthorn, virgin fruit, figs, white fruit, Luohanguo, huolongguo, kiwifruit Melons: watermelon, melon, cantaloupe, Hami melon, papaya, papaya others: pineapple, mango, chestnut, coconut, kiwi fruit, guava, durian, banana, sugarcane, lotus seed, pomegranate, walnut
